attributes.action: change the a2 motorbike license laws
attributes.additional_details: i am personally involved with a large part off the biking community and there are a lot off people who feel exactly the same as me older people aswe'll who already have there full licenses have said its totally unfair on the younger generation not just over how much its costs but in the respect that we take the same motor bike test as everybody else i would really like the goverment too take this into consideration with thanks from liam randell
attributes.background: i would like action because i am 20 turning 21 and have now taken my car license and a2 motorbike license and am still restricted too what motorbike i can own i also will have too take the same test as everyone else for a second time aswell as my theory which i find discriminative as too my age

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you'd like changes to the requirements for an A2 motorbike licence, but we're not sure exactly what changes you'd like to see. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
